name: Secret Santa!
description:
Secret Santa!!!

You've got 6 presents for the 3 people that live in this house, but you've lost he nametags!
You must figure out which present belongs to whom and leave it in their respective rooms.
Good luck and Merry Christmas!

For the 2019 Yogscast gamejam

The game is incomplete;

missing texturing in some rooms

missing a loooooooot of hints

missing a gameover state

It was our first gamejam and we learned a lot from this :)
